description:
As a **Passenger**, I want to create an account using my email address so that I can start booking rides and rentals.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Successful Registration
Given I am on the Signup page
When I enter a valid email and password
Then the system sends a verification link
And my account is created with a 'Pending' status
```

As a **User**, I want to see available taxis and bikes on a map near my current location so that I can estimate pickup times.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Display nearby vehicles
Given I have granted GPS permissions
When I open the home screen
Then the system fetches vehicles within a 5km radius
And displays them as icons on the map
```

As a **Passenger**, I want to book a taxi ride to a specific destination so that I can travel comfortably.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Confirming a ride
Given I have selected a destination
When I click 'Confirm Booking'
Then the system matches me with the nearest available driver
And displays the driver's name and vehicle plate
```

As a **System**, I want to allow passengers to cancel a ride without a fee if they do so within **15 minutes** of booking so that we maintain customer satisfaction.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Cancellation within grace period
Given I booked a ride 10 minutes ago
When I cancel the booking
Then no cancellation fee is charged to my account
```

As a **Finance Manager**, I want to charge a cancellation fee **immediately** if a passenger cancels after the driver has accepted the request so that drivers are compensated for their time.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Cancellation after acceptance
Given a driver has accepted my booking
When I cancel the ride (even 1 minute later)
Then a flat fee of $5.00 is charged to my account
```

summary: View Trip History and Digital Receipts
description:
As a **User**, I want to view my past trips and download receipts so that I can track my transportation expenses.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Downloading a receipt
Given I am in the 'My Trips' section
When I select a completed trip and click 'Download PDF'
Then a receipt with fare breakdown and date is generated
```

As a **User**, I want to rent a car for 24 hours so that I can travel long distances at my own pace.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Reserving a rental car
Given I have selected a 'Daily Rental' package
When I choose a car and pick-up time
Then the system blocks the vehicle for my selected dates
And requires a security deposit
```

As a **Driver**, I want to toggle my status between 'Online' and 'Offline' so that I can control when I receive ride requests.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Going Online
Given my status is 'Offline'
When I slide the toggle to 'Online'
Then I am visible to passengers searching for rides
```

As a **System**, I want to calculate fares based on distance and traffic so that pricing is fair for both parties.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Fare calculation logic
Given a pickup and drop-off point
When the system calculates the route
Then it applies the base fare + ($1.5 per km) + traffic surcharge
```

As a **Passenger**, I want to chat with my assigned driver so that I can provide specific pickup instructions.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Sending a message
Given I have an active booking
When I type a message in the chat overlay
Then the driver receives a notification in real-time
```

As a **User**, I want to use an internal messaging system to communicate with the driver so that I can explain my exact location.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: User messages driver
Given a driver is on the way
When I send a text via the app
Then the driver can read and reply to the message
```

As a **Driver**, I want the app to integrate with Google Maps so that I can follow the most efficient route to the passenger.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Starting Navigation
Given I have accepted a ride
When I click 'Navigate'
Then the Google Maps overlay opens with the turn-by-turn route
```

As a **Passenger**, I want to rate my driver from 1 to 5 stars so that the community knows about the service quality.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Submitting a rating
Given a trip has just ended
When I select 4 stars and click 'Submit'
Then the driver's average rating is updated
```

As a **Customer**, I want to provide a star rating for my recent journey so that the library of drivers can be audited for quality.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Feedback loop
Given the trip is finished
When I choose a star level
Then the system records the feedback against the driver's profile
```

As a **Traveler**, I want to book a seat on a long-distance bus so that I can travel between major cities cheaply.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Bus seat selection
Given I am on the 'Inter-City' tab
When I select a bus route and seat number
Then the system processes the ticket payment
```

As a **User**, I want the app to run very fast so that I am not frustrated by any waiting times.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Speed check
Given the app is open
When I perform any action
Then it should happen instantly and feel very smooth
```

As a **Passenger**, I want to schedule a ride for a later time (e.g., tomorrow morning) so that I don't have to worry about finding a car later.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Scheduling a ride
Given I am on the booking screen
When I select 'Schedule for Later' and input 08:00 AM tomorrow
Then the system confirms the booking and notifies a driver 15 mins before
```

As a **User**, I want to save multiple credit cards to my profile so that I can choose which one to use for each booking.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Adding a card
Given I am in the 'Payments' section
When I enter valid card details
Then the card is saved and masked for future use
```

As a **System**, I want to detect if a ride passes through a toll road so that the toll amount can be added to the final fare.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Toll adjustment
Given the GPS route passes through a toll gate
When the trip ends
Then the system adds the specific toll fee to the total balance
```

As a **User**, I want to submit an insurance claim directly through the app if my rental car is damaged so that I can get reimbursed.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Submitting claim
Given a rental is active
When I upload photos of damage and click 'File Claim'
Then the system processes the insurance paperwork immediately
```

As a **User**, I want to upload a profile picture so that the driver can recognize me at the pickup point.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Photo upload
Given I am on the Profile Settings page
When I select an image from my gallery
Then the image is cropped and saved to my profile
```

As a **Passenger**, I want to apply a promo code before booking so that I can get a discount on my fare.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Valid promo code
Given I have a code 'SAVE10'
When I enter it in the checkout screen
Then the total fare is reduced by 10%
```

As a **Finance Admin**, I want to calculate the total earnings for each driver every week so that we can process payments to their bank accounts.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Weekly payout calculation
Given it is Monday morning
When the payout script runs
Then it sums all completed rides for each driver and subtracts commission
```

summary: System Logic: Do the Right Thing
description:
As a **Developer**, I want the system logic to do the right thing when a user clicks buttons so that there are no bugs.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Bug-free clicking
Given I am using the app
When I click any button
Then the system should perform the correct logic perfectly
```

As a **Budget Traveler**, I want to select a 'Ride Pool' option so that I can share the cost with other passengers going the same way.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Booking a pool ride
Given I choose 'Pool' mode
When I confirm the booking
Then the system allows up to 2 other pickups on the same route
```

As a **Rental Provider**, I want to track the fuel level of a returned vehicle so that I can charge the user for any missing fuel.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Fuel check
Given a rental car is returned
When the sensor reports fuel is < 90%
Then a refueling fee is automatically calculated and billed
```

As a **Passenger**, I want an SOS button available during my ride so that I can alert local authorities in case of an emergency.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Activating SOS
Given a ride is 'In Progress'
When I tap the SOS button
Then the system sends my current GPS and trip details to the police
```

As a **Safety Officer**, I want all bike rentals to include a helmet at no extra cost to comply with local safety laws.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Helmet check
Given I am booking a bike rental
When I confirm the booking
Then the system prompts the user to pick up a helmet from the locker
```

As a **User**, I want to see connecting international flights from the airport so that I can plan my travel beyond the taxi ride.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Flight search
Given I have arrived at the airport via taxi
When I click 'Global Connections'
Then the system shows real-time flight schedules from external airlines
```

As a **User**, I want to enable Dark Mode so that I can use the app comfortably at night without eye strain.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Switching to Dark Mode
Given I am in Display Settings
When I toggle 'Dark Mode' to ON
Then the background color changes to #121212 and text to white
```

As a **Passenger**, I want to add up to 3 stops to my ride so that I can pick up friends along the way.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Adding stops
Given I am setting my destination
When I click '+' and add 'Stop A' and 'Stop B'
Then the system recalculates the fare and route to include all points
```

summary: Book a Ride for a Friend
description:
As a **User**, I want to book a ride for a contact in my phone book so that they can get home safely using my payment method.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Booking for someone else
Given I select a contact from my phone
When I book the ride
Then the driver receives the friend's name
And the friend receives an SMS with trip tracking
```

As a **Renter**, I want to choose an 'Unlimited Mileage' add-on for my car rental so that I don't pay extra for long distances.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Selecting unlimited mileage
Given I am on the rental options page
When I check the 'Unlimited Mileage' box
Then the daily rate increases by $20
And no per-km fee is applied
```

summary: Fixed Price for All Airport Trips
description:
As a **User**, I want all trips to the airport to have a fixed price of **$30** regardless of traffic or exact distance within the city.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Airport flat rate
Given my destination is set to 'International Airport'
When I view the fare
Then it shows exactly $30.00
```

As a **System**, I want to calculate airport trips using the standard **$1.5 per km** rate so that the fare is proportional to the user's distance from the terminal.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Airport distance rate
Given my destination is the Airport
When I book from a location 40km away
Then the fare is calculated as $60.00 plus base fees
```

As a **Passenger**, I want to receive a push notification when the driver is 2 minutes away so that I can head outside.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Arrival alert
Given the driver's GPS shows they are within 500m
When the system triggers the alert
Then I see a notification 'Your driver is nearly there!'
```

As an **Admin**, I want to review and approve driver licenses and insurance documents so that we maintain a safe fleet.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Document approval
Given a driver has uploaded a JPG of their license
When I click 'Approve' in the Admin Panel
Then the driver's account is activated for work
```

As a **Product Owner**, I want the user experience to be high quality so that users tell their friends about us.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Quality check
Given a user completes a trip
When they think about the app
Then their level of satisfaction should be high quality
```

As a **Member**, I want to update my stored credit card details so that I can use a different card for my vehicle bookings.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Updating card
Given I have a saved card
When I click 'Edit' and enter new expiry date
Then the record is updated in the database
```

As a **User**, I want to add funds to my in-app wallet so that I can pay for rides without using a card every time.

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Scenario: Topping up wallet
Given I am in the Wallet screen
When I enter $50 and confirm via bank transfer
Then my wallet balance reflects the new amount immediately
```
